contents.text: Thank you for calling Minted in San Francisco, where we specialize in high-quality custom cards and invitations guaranteed to delight.
For assistance with orders, shipping, or tracking, press 1.
To track your order or check shipping status, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with our order support team, who will assist you shortly.

navigationGoals: Check delivery status for my recent order of party invitations.
I want to track the shipping status of my veteran reunion invitations order.
I need the current shipping status and estimated delivery timestamp for my order #54321.
Could you tell me when my recent order of custom cards will arrive?
I’d like to check the shipping status of my recent custom card order.

contents.text: To discuss returns, exchanges, or our satisfaction guarantee, press 2.
One moment please, we are transferring you to our returns and satisfaction guarantee specialists.

navigationGoals: Start a return for the birthday cards I received last week.
I need to arrange an exchange for the commemorative cards I received.
I’d like to initiate a return for order #54321 and generate an RMA with a prepaid shipping label.
I’d like to arrange a return for a set of cards that arrived damaged.
I need to initiate a return for my invitation order and confirm the exchange policy.

contents.text: For help with design customization and product inquiries, press 2.
For help customizing a holiday card, wedding invitation, or other design, press 1.
Thank you for your patience, connecting you now with our design specialists.

navigationGoals: Adjust the design layout and color scheme for my holiday cards.
I’d like to customize military-themed holiday cards.
I want to adjust the CMYK color profile and bleed area on my holiday card design file before print.
I need assistance adding a family photo into my holiday card design.
I want to customize the design elements for my holiday cards, like layout and colors.

contents.text: For information about our fine paper stock, printing methods, or designer community, press 2.
Your call is important, please hold for our product information team.

navigationGoals: Find out what paper stocks and print techniques you offer for wedding invitations.
I’m looking for info on paper stock and printing methods for my reunion invitations.
Can you provide the paper stock specifications – GSM, coating options, and maximum DPI your Indigo presses support?
I’d like details on your paper options for my wedding invitations.
I’m looking for details on your paper stock and printing methods for a wedding invitation.
